COMPONENT.MODULE:
1.Instructor interface with full control.
2.Shared whiteboard.
3.Text chat functionalty is available.
4.Audio/video communication.
5.Desktop sharing.
6.Http-tunnel support: can also work behind firewalls.
7.Peer-to-peer (p2p) architecture.
8.Both multicast and unicast network communication.
9.Recorder for archiving the lecture sessions.
10.Handraise functionalty.
11.Student interface with full control after getting permission.
12.Platform independent technology.
13Audio Mixer is available (maximum two audio).
14.Video mixeris available (maximum two video).
